known_issues: Holdings search is currently case-sensitive; lowercase queries (e.g., "icp") do not match uppercase holdings (e.g., "ICP").

existing_features.title: Update the holdings search/filter logic so that matching holdings is case-insensitive (e.g., a query of "icp" must match a holding with ticker "ICP"). Apply this to any UI that filters holdings by a text query (at minimum, the portfolio holdings list/table filtering behavior).
